text.section: This section applies to any vehicle required to be registered under this title.
If a vehicle is not registered, a person may not drive the vehicle on a highway in this State.
If a vehicle is not registered, the owner of the vehicle may not knowingly allow the vehicle to be driven on a highway in this State.
If the required registration fee for a vehicle has not been paid, a person may not drive the vehicle on a highway in this State.
If the required registration fee for a vehicle has not been paid, the owner of the vehicle may not knowingly allow the vehicle to be driven on a highway in this State.
If the registration of a vehicle is canceled, a person may not drive the vehicle on a highway in this State.
If the registration of a vehicle is canceled, the owner of the vehicle may not knowingly allow the vehicle to be driven on a highway in this State.
If the registration of a vehicle is suspended, a person may not drive the vehicle on a highway in this State.
If the registration of a vehicle is suspended, the owner of the vehicle may not knowingly allow the vehicle to be driven on a highway in this State.
If the registration of a vehicle is revoked, a person may not drive the vehicle on a highway in this State.
If the registration of a vehicle is revoked, the owner of the vehicle may not knowingly allow the vehicle to be driven on a highway in this State.
